statements: SELECT * FROM content_management_system;
SELECT title, author FROM content_management_system;
SELECT content_id, title, author, created_at FROM content_management_system;
SELECT * FROM content_management_system WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT title FROM content_management_system WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT * FROM content_management_system WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content_management_system WHERE author LIKE 'J%';
SELECT content_id, title FROM content_management_system WHERE content_type LIKE '%News%';
SELECT * FROM content_management_system WHERE author = 'Jane Doe' AND content_type = 'Blog';
SELECT * FROM content_management_system WHERE title LIKE '%Introduction%';
SELECT content_id, title, created_at FROM content_management_system WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM content_management_system;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM content_management_system;
SELECT AVG(content_id) FROM content_management_system;
SELECT MAX(created_at) FROM content_management_system;
SELECT MIN(created_at) FROM content_management_system;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM content_management_system GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, AVG(content_id) AS avg_content_id FROM content_management_system GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT content_type, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM content_management_system GROUP BY content_type;
SELECT author, content_type, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM content_management_system GROUP BY author, content_type;
SELECT author, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at) AS year FROM content_management_system GROUP BY author, year ORDER BY author, year;
SELECT * FROM content_management_system;
SELECT content_id, title FROM content_management_system WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM content_management_system WHERE content_type = 'Article' GROUP BY author;
SELECT * FROM content_management_system WHERE author LIKE 'John%';
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content_management_system WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM content_management_system;
SELECT content_id, title, content_text FROM content_management_system WHERE content_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM content_management_system GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT content_id, title, author, created_at FROM content_management_system WHERE author = 'Jane' AND content_type = 'Blog';
SELECT content_id, title, author, created_at FROM content_management_system ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_id, title, content_text FROM content_management_system WHERE content_text ILIKE '%announcement%' AND content_text ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content_management_system WHERE content_type IN ('Article', 'News') AND created_at < '2023-01-01';
SELECT author, MAX(created_at) AS latest_post FROM content_management_system GROUP BY author;
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content_management_system WHERE content_text IS NULL;
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content_management_system WHERE content_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT author, AVG(LENGTH(content_text)) AS avg_content_length FROM content_management_system GROUP BY author;
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content_management_system WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT author, COUNT(DISTINCT content_type) AS type_count FROM content_management_system GROUP BY author;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM content_management_system WHERE author <> 'Admin' GROUP BY author;
SELECT content_type, COUNT(*) AS type_count FROM content_management_system GROUP BY content_type ORDER BY type_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM digital_content;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content;
SELECT content_id, content_description FROM digital_content;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM digital_content;
SELECT * FROM content_categories;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM content_categories;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_type = 'video';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_type = 'image';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_size > 1000;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_size <= 500;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_id = 10;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content ORDER BY content_title;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content ORDER BY content_size DESC;
SELECT content_id, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM digital_content GROUP BY content_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM content_categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_id = 5 OR content_id = 10 OR content_id = 15;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_description LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_title LIKE 'A%';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM digital_content WHERE content_title ILIKE 'm%';
SELECT * FROM digital_content WHERE content_type = 'Video' AND content_size > 1000;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_description LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT content_title, content_size FROM digital_content WHERE content_id IN (SELECT content_id FROM content_categories WHERE category_name = 'Educational');
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_type = 'Photo' AND (content_size > 500 OR content_description LIKE '%landscape%');
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM digital_content JOIN content_categories ON digital_content.content_id = content_categories.category_id;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_description IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM digital_content;
SELECT content_title, AVG(content_size) AS avg_size FROM digital_content GROUP BY content_title;
SELECT category_id, category_name, COUNT(*) AS content_count FROM content_categories LEFT JOIN digital_content ON category_id = content_type GROUP BY category_id, category_name;
SELECT content_title, content_size, category_name FROM digital_content LEFT JOIN content_categories ON digital_content.content_id = content_categories.category_id;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content ORDER BY content_title ASC;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_type = 'Document' OR content_type = 'Presentation' ORDER BY content_size DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_id IN (SELECT content_id FROM content_categories WHERE category_name = 'Entertainment') ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_type = 'Audio' AND content_size > 2000;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM digital_content WHERE content_description LIKE '%funny%' AND content_type = 'Video';
SELECT category_id, AVG(content_size) AS avg_size FROM digital_content JOIN content_categories ON digital_content.content_type = category_id GROUP BY category_id;

SELECT * FROM Digital_Content;

SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Content_Tags;
SELECT tag_name FROM Content_Tags WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name FROM Content_Tags WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT c.content_title, t.tag_name FROM Digital_Content c INNER JOIN Content_Tags t ON c.content_id = t.content_id;
SELECT u.username, c.content_title FROM Users u INNER JOIN Digital_Content c ON u.user_id = c.content_id;
SELECT u.username, c.content_title, ct.tag_name FROM Users u INNER JOIN Digital_Content c ON u.user_id = c.content_id INNER JOIN Content_Tags ct ON c.content_id = ct.content_id;
SELECT c.content_title, u.username, ct.tag_name FROM Digital_Content c LEFT JOIN Users u ON c.content_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN Content_Tags ct ON c.content_id = ct.content_id;
SELECT c.content_title, ca.category_name FROM Digital_Content c LEFT JOIN Categories ca ON c.content_id = ca.category_id;
SELECT c.content_title, u.username FROM Digital_Content c CROSS JOIN Users u;

SELECT MAX(content_id) AS max_content_id FROM Digital_Content;

SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT category_id, name FROM Categories
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM Tags
SELECT c.id, c.title, c.content, t.tag_name FROM Content c JOIN Content_Tags ct ON c.id = ct.content_id JOIN Tags t ON ct.tag_id = t.tag_id
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, c.title FROM Users u JOIN Content c ON u.user_id = c.id
SELECT c.id, c.title, ca.name AS category_name FROM Content c JOIN Categories ca ON c.id = ca.category_id
SELECT u.username, u.email, t.tag_name FROM Users u JOIN Content c ON u.user_id = c.id JOIN Content_Tags ct ON c.id = ct.content_id JOIN Tags t ON ct.tag_id = t.tag_id
SELECT c.id, c.title, ct.tag_id, t.tag_name FROM Content c JOIN Content_Tags ct ON c.id = ct.content_id JOIN Tags t ON ct.tag_id = t.tag_id
SELECT u.username, t.tag_name FROM Users u JOIN Content c ON u.user_id = c.id JOIN Content_Tags ct ON c.id = ct.content_id JOIN Tags t ON ct.tag_id = t.tag_id

SELECT title, content FROM Content WHERE title LIKE '%example%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM Content;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM Categories;
SELECT title, tag_name FROM Content INNER JOIN Content_Tags ON Content.id = Content_Tags.content_id INNER JOIN Tags ON Content_Tags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id WHERE Tags.tag_name = 'technology';
SELECT * FROM Content ORDER BY published_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT name, description FROM Categories ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT title, content FROM Content WHERE content LIKE '%tutorial%' OR content LIKE '%guide%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tags FROM Tags;
SELECT DISTINCT title FROM Content WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM Users;
SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM Categories INNER JOIN Content ON Categories.category_id = Content.id GROUP BY Categories.name;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'jane_smith' OR username = 'alex_jones';
SELECT title, COUNT(*) AS total_tags FROM Content INNER JOIN Content_Tags ON Content.id = Content_Tags.content_id GROUP BY Content.title;
SELECT * FROM Content WHERE published_date < '2022-01-01' AND title LIKE '%announcement%';
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM Tags INNER JOIN Content_Tags ON Tags.tag_id = Content_Tags.tag_id GROUP BY Tags.tag_name;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS total_tags FROM Categories INNER JOIN Content ON Categories.category_id = Content.id INNER JOIN Content_Tags ON Content.id = Content_Tags.content_id GROUP BY Categories.name;
